entry.def: Leafy trees and plants have lots of leaves on them.

example.ex: His two-story brick home was graced with a patio and surrounded by tall, leafy trees.
example.tran: 他那两层高的砖房有一个漂亮的露台，四周环拥绿叶成阴的大树。

entry.tran: （地方）草木葱茏的，树木繁茂的
entry.def: You say that a place is leafy when there are lots of trees and plants there.

example.ex: ...semi-detached homes with gardens in leafy suburban areas.
example.tran: 位于草木葱茏的市郊住宅区、带花园的半独立房子

means.word_mean: 多叶的;叶茂的;多树木的

sentences.en: in the leafy shade of a fig tree
The trail wends its way through leafy woodland and sunny meadows.
sentences.cn: 这条小径穿过葱郁的林区和洒满阳光的草地。

sentences.en: The trees formed a leafy canopy above their heads.
sentences.cn: 树木在他们头顶上空形成了一个枝叶茂盛的遮篷。

sentences.en: They sat under the leafy bower at the end of the garden and watched the sun set.
sentences.cn: 他们坐在花园尽头由叶子搭成的凉棚下观看落日。

sentences.en: A deep-rooted tree is leafy;an ambitious man is vigorous.
sentences.cn: 根深叶才茂,志壮干劲高。
